result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (3rd) and Operating w/ PAC (3rd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (3rd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (3rd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Christopher L Johnson was found guilty of Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).
  • Christopher L Johnson was found guilty of OWI (3rd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
IMPOSED & STAYED
8/6/18 Crt removes 79 days of credit on ct 1 only. DOC imposed credit because sentence was imposed & stayed.

Each count concur.
1/23/18 Crt orders JOC entered on 6/28/17 for ct 1 to be vacated. The 79 days of credit should remain.

miscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.

$268 to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.  $250 DNA surcharge remitted.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  Do not drive a motor vehicle without valid DL and approval of agent.

OWI Treatment Court. Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample. Already on file.

supervisions.notes: IID restriction effective upon licensure for 36 months.

miscConds.notes: $2,633 to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.

supervisions.notes: Concur to ct 1.  To be served in WPS pursuant to sec. 973.03(2).
